t: Amazon and Meta fruaduantly sell used Quest Pro as... - Meta Community Forums - 1028429
s: January 3, 2024 - I bought a brand new Quest Pro, when I received the shipment from Amazon it contained a used product, with Velco stuck on the headband, missing wrist straps and missing cover. I raised with with Amazon and Meta. Their response, ship the unit back at your cost, we will refund and order a new one.
